location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 20, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of letters, telegrams, and notes between officials of the Foreign Office and the Political Resident in Persian Gulf regarding an enquiry from the Italian Ministry for Foreign Affairs in Rome requesting the repatriation of Santo Gionfriddo, an Italian citizen who is supposedly interned at Bahrain, Persian Gulf. The letters involve a search for Gionfriddoâ€™s location. Also involved are the Bahrain Political Agent and the Arabian-American Oil Company.
